attributes.description:
The Ford Focus Hatch 1.5T Trend Auto is a fresh hatchback that has been kept in great condition. The vehicle has great mileage for its year, and comes with a host of extra features:

-Towbar
-Front PDC + Rear PDC
-Radio/CD
-USB Port
-Aux Port
-Climate Control
-Cruise Control
-Multi Function Steering Wheel
-Bluetooth

attributes.description:
This Subaru Forester 2.0 XT is a remarkable family SUV that has been well maintaned and it in great condition. With a cool sunroof to let the sunshine in on those bright days, this Subaru is a dream come true. Some of the extrea features on this vehicle include:

-Leather Interior
-Reverse Camera
-Cruise Control
-Multi Function Steering Wheel
-Multi Meda Screen
-Bluetooth
-USB Port
-AUX Port
-Radio/CD Player
-Climate Control
-Electric Mirrors
-Electric Windows

attributes.description:
This Volkswagen Transporter 2.0BiTDI 146kW Crew Bus SWB 4Motion is an absolutely stunning vehicle. Still in immaculate condition with extremely low mileage (basically brand new) with balance of the EasyDrive Service Plan 3 years/60 000km, this vehicle is an winner! The extra features include:

-Upgraded Suspension & Shock Absorption
-Removalbe/Lockable Trailer Hit
-Lockable Wheel Bolts
-Leather-Wrapped Multi Function Steering
-Park Distance Control In Front
-Front Fog Lamps with Cornering
-Rear View Camera System
-Cruise Control System
-LED Main Headlamps
-All-Season Tires 215/60 R71
-Alloy Wheels

attributes.description: The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / 100km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. The Swift’s floating roof design, solid shoulder lines, and rich side body sculpting unite to give you a driving experience that thrills. Its low, short, wide stance has a presence that can’t be ignored, making you stand out wherever you go. Designed to give you all the right feels, the new Suzuki Swift is a bold statement in design and style. Book your test drive today...
